title: Call of Duty®: WaW
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English.  Call of Duty: World at War  Experience the intensity and brutality of war like never before. Unleash the power of the flamethrower, flame tanks, and other lethal weaponry while battling through the most harrowing campaigns in the Pacific and Europe. For the first time ever in Call of Duty, play Co-Op with up to 4 players on Xbox LIVE. In Multiplayer, compete on Xbox LIVE to complete challenges, gain experience, level up, and unlock perks to take out your opponents.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World at War – Demo
childDownloads.description: Download the Call of Duty: World at War Demo to experience the intensity and brutality of war like never before. This demo showcases the campaign mission “Hard Landing”, which is available for single player and online cooperative play for up to four players. Unleash the power of the flamethrower, flame tanks, and other lethal weaponry while battling through the most harrowing campaigns in the Pacific and Europe. For the first time ever in Call of Duty, play Co-Op with up to 4 players on Xbox LIVE.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World At War Chaos of War Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Witness the epic intensity of Call of Duty: World at War's Chaos of War vignette featuring gameplay that displays the brutality and chaos of war.  Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the entire war experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Survive the uncensored experience of the most gritty and chaotic combat ever seen before.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World At War Launch Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: No rules. No fear. No mercy. Only chaos. This Launch trailer prepares you for the brutally intense and epic experience that is Call of Duty®: World at War.  Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the entire war experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Survive the uncensored experience of the most gritty and chaotic combat ever seen before.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1 Launch Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Download the Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1 Launch Trailer to get a taste of the 4 all-new multiplayer maps: Station, Knee Deep, Nightfire and the fan favorite - Verrückt (Zombie Asylum).

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2 Zombie Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2 continues to expand the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps.  Battle to control the river bridge in “Banzai” a bright jungle map featuring a waterfall and hidden caves.  In “Corrosion” face down your enemy in a shattered train yard, and in “Sub Pens” wipe the monsoon rain from your eyes as you struggle over a bombed-out submarine base.  The Zombies return in “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp) featuring Perk machines, the deadly new Wunderwaffe DG-2, new Achievements and flaming Hell Hounds.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3 (Zombie Trailer) - HD
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3 further expands the COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Fight for ocean territory in "Battery," defend Russia's resources in "Revolution," and battle in the dense streets of "Breach." Zombies return in "Der Riese" (Zombie Factory), a Nazi research facility featuring a weapon upgrading Pack A Punch Machine, teleporters, and 10 Achievements/Trophies. Download this trailer.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World at War Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Download and customize your Xbox 360 dashboard with a gritty wartime environment that embodies the brutality of Call of Duty: World at War. Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the WWII experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Harness four-player co-op gameplay to coordinate assault strategies with your teammates like never before. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World At War Urban Warfare Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War's Urban Warfare vignette displays the gritty turmoil of combat. The fast-paced intensity never lets up us as cities get annihilated by planes, tanks, missiles and gunfire.  Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the entire war experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Survive the uncensored experience of the most gritty and chaotic combat ever seen before.

childDownloads.title: Call of Duty: World At War Voices of War Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Watch Call of Duty: World at War's Voices of War vignette as Gary Oldman and Kiefer Sutherland use their vocal talents to help create the intensity that redefines the entire war experience.  Call of Duty®: World at War pits players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Survive the uncensored experience of the most gritty and chaotic combat ever seen before.

childDownloads.title: Co-Op Gameplay Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Witness the next evolution in the Call of Duty franchise in the Call of Duty: World At War's Co-op trailer featuring actual gameplay and exclusive co-op challenges and scoring.  Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the entire war experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Harness four-player co-op gameplay to coordinate assault strategies with your teammates like never before.

childDownloads.title: Death Cards Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: This premium theme features the game-changing Death Cards hidden throughout Call of Duty: World at War. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Fire & Destruction Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: The title says it all. In the Fire & Destruction vignette, take in the blazing mayhem that is Call of Duty®: World at War as flamethrower tanks leave behind raging infernos in their wake.  Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the entire war experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Survive the uncensored experience of the most gritty and chaotic combat ever seen before.

childDownloads.title: Heroes Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: The battle-hardened American and Russian heroes of Call of Duty: World at War stand tall and ready for action. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Makin Bonus Map
childDownloads.description: Free Multiplayer Map! The tide is out and the sun is high – this daytime version of Makin sheds new light on the battle!

childDownloads.title: Map Pack 1
childDownloads.description: The Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1 expands the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Players fight through the burning streets of Berlin in “Nightfire” and take up battle positions in fortified Japanese bunkers in "Knee Deep." “Station” offers a bombed out underground train station, and the Nazi Zombies return in “Verrückt” (Zombie Asylum) featuring more weapons, new Perks-a-Cola machines and electroshock defenses. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Map Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2 continues to expand the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps.  Battle to control the river bridge in “Banzai” a bright jungle map featuring a waterfall and hidden caves.  In “Corrosion” face down your enemy in a shattered train yard, and in “Sub Pens” wipe the monsoon rain from your eyes as you struggle over a bombed-out submarine base.  The Zombies return in “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp) featuring Perk machines, the deadly new Wunderwaffe DG-2, new Achievements and flaming Hell Hounds. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Map Pack 3
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3 further expands the COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Fight for ocean territory in "Battery," defend Russia's resources in "Revolution," and battle in the dense streets of "Breach." Zombies return in "Der Riese" (Zombie Factory), a Nazi research facility featuring a weapon upgrading Pack A Punch Machine, teleporters, and 10 Achievements. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Map Pack Bundle
childDownloads.description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack Bundle features the nine multiplayer maps and three co-op Zombie maps from Map Packs 1, 2, & 3. Fight through war-torn Berlin in “Nightfire,” battle through the waterfalls of “Banzai,” and defend an armored island in “Battery,” plus much more. Zombies and Hell Hounds attack in “Verrückt” (Zombie Asylum), “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp), and “Der Riese” (Zombie Factory). Survive against the Zombie horde with the help of Perks-a-Cola machines, Monkey Bombs, and the powerful Wunderwaffe DG-2. This bundle features the 20 Achievements from Map Packs 1, 2 & 3. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Multiplayer Gameplay Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Unleash the hounds with Call of Duty®: World at War's Multiplayer trailer, which features actual gameplay that previews some new Perks as well as a few old favorites.  Call of Duty® addictive class-based multiplayer action is back with enhanced stats, gameplay, customizable classes and the addition of vehicular combat. In Call of Duty®: World at War, experience the brutal and gritty intensity of 18-player combat as it's meant to be played.

childDownloads.title: Nazi Zombies Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: The terrifying Nazi Zombie horde continues its unending attack in this chilling premium theme. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Pinup Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: War-weary soldiers can take a moment to enjoy classic beauties in this pinup girl-focused premium theme. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Verrückt (Zombie Asylum) Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Download this trailer to see the Zombie map included in the COD:WaW Map Pack 1. “Verrückt” is a terrifying Zombie asylum located in the outskirts of Berlin. The map splits the four players into pairs, challenging the two teams to find each other for survival. Featuring more weapons, perks via the addition of Perks-a-Cola machines, electroshock defenses and the endless Nazi Zombie horde, “Verrückt” will push you to the edge of your sanity.

childDownloads.title: Worldwide Video Premiere (HD)
childDownloads.description: The next Call of Duty revealed! Watch the premiere of the worldwide reveal trailer. Call of Duty®: World at War re-defines the WWII experience, pitting players against enemies in the Pacific and European theaters who know no surrender and will unleash surprising new tactics in a fight to the death. Harness four-player co-op gameplay to coordinate assault strategies with your teammates like never before. Download this trailer.

childDownloads.title: Zombie Factory Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Let the undead of Map Pack 3 run rampant on your Dashboard in this disturbing new Premium Theme!  Teleporters and Pack A Punch Machines spring to life when friends are online, but beware, Zombies close in when they log off.  Experience the tension and atmosphere of Der Riese (Zombie Factory) featuring Hell Hounds, Monkey Bombs, and more Zombies than ever! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Zombie Swamp Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Swarms of Imperial Zombies rise from the misty swamps and flaming Hell Hounds blaze through the jungle in this over the top premium theme for Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2.  This theme features the new Flogger Trap and Zipline and showcases the deadly new Wunderwaffe DG-2. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Zombie Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Play through Call of Duty®: World at War, watch the credits roll, then try to survive the intense fanatical onslaught of the Nazi zombies. The Zombie Bonus Mode Trailer gives a glimpse of the unlockable bonus mode that can be played solo or with up to 3 friends via Co-Op. Accumulate points to open new sections and purchase weapon upgrades and ammo - which will be needed to fight off waves of zombies that gain strength as the action escalates.
